      • isValidValue

        protected boolean isValidValue(String valueStr)
        Description copied from class: StringValueValidator
        Check if the value is valid, the isValueRequired property will have already been validated against an empty value. A null or empty string will never be passed to this method.
        Specified by:
        isValidValue in class StringValueValidator
        Parameters:
        valueStr - The value as returned by getComponentValue() .
        Returns:
        true if the component data is valid.
